articles.title: 9 test positive for Zika virus in Pune district; tally stands at 48 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Out of the nine cases, seven cases were reported in Pune Municipal Corporation area, and one each in Wagholi, Pune rural and Pune Cantonment Board area
articles.content:
The district reported a sharp rise in Zika cases on Sunday with nine fresh cases which has taken the tally to 48, as per the health department.

articles.title: Here's What 'Diet' Soft Drink Could Be Doing to Your Health in The Long Term - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Many people are drinking less sugary soft drink than in the past.
articles.content:
Many people are drinking less sugary soft drink than in the past. This is a great win for public health, given the recognised risks of diets high in sugar-sweetened drinks.

articles.author: Shifa Khan
articles.title: 10 reasons to eat a spoonful of sunflower seeds everyday - The Times of India
articles.description: 10 reasons to eat a spoonful of sunflower seeds everyday.
articles.content: The high content of healthy fats, particularly unsaturated fats, in sunflower seeds can help reduce bad cholesterol levels. This, in turn, lowers the risk of cardiovascular diseases.
